name: Dragon valley
description:
Dragon valley is a first-person action adventure game with realistic model and exciting process. Players are located in a grand canyon.You can use two weapons, bow and sword. Destroy all dragons in the canyon alive and you will win.There are two weapons, bow and sword in front of the birth point. You can attack when you pick up. Players can switch freely.
WASD controls the task；
F picks up the weapon；
Mouse wheel switch weapons；
Mouse control perspective；
